main_features: Plug-and-play Thunderbolt 3/4 external GPU enclosure with PCIe Gen3 x4 tunneling
Includes an entry-level discrete GPU (8 GB GDDR6) optimized for 1080p gaming and GPU-accelerated workloads
Compact, quiet design with integrated 350 W PSU and 60 W host charging over Thunderbolt

technical_specs.gpu_class: Entry-level discrete GPU (comparable to NVIDIA GTX 1650 Super / AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT)
